itunes:title: 249 - 3 Ways How to Make More Money So You Can Have More Time to Be Creative
itunes:author: Creative Pep Talk
itunes:summary:
Nothing drives me more crazy than not having enough time to make creative work. Sacrificing quality, deadline stress and lack of margin can ruin what makes a creative career worth having in the first place.

In our society MONEY really does mean TIME. If you can make more money, you have the power to slow down and give your creative work and life the time it deserves.

In this episode I want to share two quick tactics that have helped me find more time and money and one bigger idea on the subject that's currently blowing my mind!
itunes:subtitle:
Nothing drives me more crazy than not having enough time to make creative work. Sacrificing quality, deadline stress and lack of margin can ruin what makes a creative career worth having in the first place.

In our society MONEY really does mean TIME. If you can make more money, you have the power to slow down and give your creative work and life the time it deserves.

In this episode I want to share two quick tactics that have helped me find more time and money and one bigger idea on the subject that's currently blowing my mind!
